node.title: O'Dea brothers part company to chase more Commonwealth Games medals (apart)
node.description: Sam and Ben O'Dea took bronze at Gold Coast 2018, but will chase more spoils with different teammates.
node.content: ["When it comes to sibling rivalry, the O'Dea brothers do it best.", "The pair claimed beach volleyball bronze at the 2018 Gold Coast Commonwealth Games and were all but guaranteed a spot at Birmingham in six months time, but\u00a0turned it down to form new partnerships and go head-to-head for the same qualification spot.", "The competition is fierce on the NZ Beach Volleyball Tour, especially when the O'Dea brothers are involved.\u00a0", "\"We let our play do the talking, not our mouths,\" says Sam O'Dea.\n", "Their decision to part company wasn't an easy one.", "\"We've been together for so long and the decision comes on the back of a pretty tough season for us,\" says Ben O'Dea. \"We didn't perform that well and it just made sense.\"\n", "But the opportunity to switch things up wasn't without some brotherly betrayal.\u00a0", "\"Well, he confirmed with another guy the day before that he was going to play with him for the tour,\" says Sam. \"Then I gave him a call and he told me this, and I was like, 'I'm going to leave it up to you to make the decision'.", "\"It was kind of a cool little a pre-test for his commitment, I guess.\"", "Regardless, the pair admit it has raised the stakes and the quality of the overall competition.", "\"It's always hard playing against each other,\" says Ben. \"We know each other so well, so it's a bit of a mental battle, but a lot of fun and first of many this season.\"", "Whoever performs the best on the NZ tour will become the preferred team for the Commonwealth Games.", "The others will then have one final chance to prove themselves overseas, before selection is finalised in May. Sam O'Dea\u00a0is currently one win up in the scramble for selection.", "\"It's pretty simple to get that spot,\" he insists. \"You've just got to win games and that's all I kind of think about.\"\u00a0", "This sibling rivalry will certainly serve up plenty of drama over coming the coming months, as both teams have a dig at Commonwealth Games qualification."]
